links.*: Cirion and Eorl and the Friendship of Gondor and Rohan

wikitext.*:
{{sources}}
'''''-o''''' (pl. '''-ion''' and '''-ron''') is the [[Quenya]] and [[Telerin]] element that marks the genitive of nouns. <ref name=":0">{{WJ|Quendi}}, p. 369</ref>

It is derived from the element [[HO]] "from" used as an enclitic and eventually as a suffix.

==Examples==
*'''Oromëo:''' "coming from Orome, of Orome"  '''<ref name=":0" />'''
*'''Elenna-nórëo:''' "of the Land of the Star" <ref>{{UT|8c}}</ref>
*'''Rithil-Anamo'''"Doom Ring" <ref>{{WJ|Quendi}}, p. 401</ref>
*'''Rúmilo'''"of Rúmil" <ref>{{WJ|Quendi}}, p. 398</ref>
*'''aran Lestanórëo'''"King of Doriath"<ref name=":0"></ref>

{{references}}
